file_content.text: I... Jedi, a question?
What can I do for you?
Ask away.
No need to ask permission, Gaden-Ko. What is it?
I welcome questions.
You were right. Commandos were the sign to guide me.
Jenar-Sei's commandos were the sign to guide me.
The sign came without a vision. You need no visions.
Do visions mark my people as special? Or needing guidance?
They may be your foundation, but you'd still have a civilization without visions.
Visions aren't everything.
The Voss are certainly unique. Beyond that, I cannot judge.
I don't know.
Uncertainty is peculiar.
Being convinced you have a great destiny is a path to destruction.
Everyone needs guidance.
Intriguing.
Great questions are for Mystics. Not potentials. This is new.
Visions or not, your pilgrimage is certainly shaping you for a role.
You're thinking like a Mystic.
I may never be Mystic. But I learn.
Your pilgrimage is ahead.
Let's go.
Difficult ideas teach more than simple answers.
Keep asking questions.
I will remember. Thank you, Jedi.
I'd like to think about this myself, when we get back.
The Deep Cradle. We go carefully.
Whatever it is, keep it to yourself.
No.
I apologize. To the Deep Cradle. With caution.
[Gaden-Ko waits for when the path will be safe for him]
The Gormak withdraw.
We fought seven patrols. Are the crystals safe?
Yes. And I believe this rightfully belongs to your people.
I have a crystal for you.
This is for the Tower of Prophecy.
My mission is complete.
I suggest you harvest the crystal quickly before the Gormak recover.
For now, at least.
Two commandos vanished. Gaden-Ko's intuition saved another.
Something hunted us. Not Gormak.
Did you catch any glimpse of this hunter?
Any idea what it was?
No. Commandos were there, then gone.
A potential Mystic would be irresistible to an enemy scout team.
Likely someone after Gaden-Ko.
Your men must have disturbed some native predator.
An animal, probably.
We know this terrain well.
We will search. I am not hopeful.
Best of luck, sir. I hope they turn up.
Scout in threes. It's safer in hostile territory.
I have... finished here. Our last destination is ahead. The Deep Cradle.
Rather an odd name for a holy place.
"Deep Cradle"? How strange.
We were created there, from Voss. I will see.
What's wrong? Is it the missing commandos?
You seem upset.
No. I... must think. We leave.
Good, we're nearly finished.
You cannot. The lands near the cradle are corrupted. The "Nightmare Lands."
I have seen for myself how the Gormak target your holy grounds.
The Gormak again, perhaps.
They poison everything.
Do you mean these lands have been damaged somehow?
Corrupted?
Men go mad there.
I've survived many horrors.
There are protective rituals. Talan-De at the commando outpost will guide. We shall go.
A favor? The Gormak spread. We waste men scouting.
This device tracks Gormak. Plant it, and we protect the pilgrimage ways again.
Hopefully, your protection will allow other potentials to finish their training.
This will help the Mystics.
It is our duty. Please.
Not a problem.
Your help is valued.
No. We're busy.
We must do this.
You both show promise. Goodbye.
Be sure no Gormak followed us. At your word, we continue.
Welcome home. I watched for you. You survived the Nightmare Lands.
Hello again. Your men who went missing, have you found them?
Did your commandos turn up?
We search. The device you planted tracks Gormak. This helps.
More than that. Gaden-Ko completed his pilgrimage and had his first vision.
Gaden-Ko is a Mystic.
I'm afraid I can't place you.
We've met, haven't we?
I am Jenar-Sei. A commando. We fought Gormak together.
Jenar-Sei. I have seen.
A new Mystic! Not for years.... The Three hoped, when I mentioned.
I can escort you, Gaden-Ko. The interpreters, for your vision.
Surely Gaden-Ko knows best what his vision means.
Why does he need interpreters?
Mystics see. Interpreters solve. The Three decide. This is proper.
I imagine it would not be proper for a non-Voss to be present.
You two go on ahead.
Gaden-Ko is under my protection; I'll escort him there.
He's my ward, not yours.
Please allow. I gain prestige with commandos.
Jedi, the Three lead us. They must speak with you after.
Rest. Prepare. Then follow.
